item.title: ::yell Titles...HELP
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

both ways will work, although it IS better pratice to use Else-If statements, rather than clumps of If statements.

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell Titles...HELP
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Daginith:

put that if statement to the top of the code (above the ‘player’ one). the issue is that the code reads the first match. seeing as the donnor == 1 is the first match, it picks that one, and not the one named ‘owner’.

And the fact that he wasn’t using else if statements aswell contributes to the problem. The code I posted a second ago should work.

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell Titles...HELP
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

put that if statement to the top of the code (above the ‘player’ one). the issue is that the code reads the first match. seeing as the donnor == 1 is the first match, it picks that one, and not the one named ‘owner’.

item.title: ::yell Titles...HELP
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Here ya go.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = "";
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("0wn3r")) {
titles = "[Owner]-";
}
else if ((playerRights == 0) || (playerRights == 4)) {
titles = "[Player]-";
}
else if (donator == 1) {
titles = "[Donator]-";
}
else if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[Moderator]-";
} 
else if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[Admin]-";
}
else if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[Co-Owner]-";
}
yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
+ command.substring(5));
}

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell Titles...HELP
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

when i yell, it says donator even when im the owner… any fix?

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;
if (playerRights == 4) {
titles = “[Player]-”;
}
if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = “[Player]-”;
}
if (donator == 1) {
titles = “[Donator]-”;
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = “[Moderator]-”;
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = “[Admin]-”;
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = “[Co-Owner]-”;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“0wn3r”)) {
titles = “[Owner]-”;
}
yell(titles + “” + playerName + ": "

  • command.substring(5));
    }

Read full topic
